description: This file defines a Zustand store for user authentication, managing user state, token, role, and related methods like login, logout, register, and initialization.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the user state by fetching current user info from the API.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates the user with provided credentials and updates the store.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with given payload and updates the store.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and clears user state.
